Description: Global upper limit for the maximum capacity of each extendable DC link.
Specifies whether to add HVDC link projects from the `TYNDP 2018 <https://tyndp.entsoe.eu/tyndp2018/projects/>`_ which are at least in permitting.

Values: One of {'zero': set capacity to zero, 'remove': remove completely, 'keep': keep with full capacity}
Description: Specifies how to handle lines which are currently under construction.
